title: The Trials of Franz Kafka
creator_credit: Harold Mantell, Kratky Film and Harold Mantell Inc
brief_description: An interpretation of the trials of childhood, youth, and tragic adulthood which Kafka described in his novels and stories, photographed in the author’s native Prague. Displays an understanding of modern man’s anxiety and alienation. English version adapted by Harold Mantell Inc. Narrated by Kurt Vonnegut Jr.
